name: vriksh-ai
description: VrikshAI - Ancient Wisdom. Modern Intelligence. Full-stack plant identification and care platform.

scripts.dev: npm run dev:backend & npm run dev:frontend
scripts.dev:backend:
echo '
⚠️  Backend runs serverless on Vercel. For local testing, use test_service.py
' && echo 'To test backend locally:' && echo '  cd backend && python test_service.py
'
scripts.vercel-build: cd web && npm install && npm run build
scripts.reinstall: npm run clean && npm run install

author: VrikshAI Team
